name: ALONE (itch) (ShauryaS)
description: This is a story about a boy named "MONK", who is completely different from all, always was he made felt that he's all alone by "the" world. Until one day a saint told him,"In order to know your true potential, you must go to the land of the top", the boy decides to make to the top where he was told there were many like him also the world there was far better than this one, fighting all odds will he make to the top, and find the answer to his question, "Am I Alone ?"
